concept_data.title: Central American Bank for Economic Integration

summary: The Central American Bank for Economic Integration (CABEI) is an extra-European organisation that plays a pivotal role in fostering economic development and regional integration in Central America. In the context of EU legal and regulatory frameworks, CABEI serves as a partner for the EU in promoting sustainable development, enhancing trade relations, and facilitating investment in the region. The EU recognizes CABEI's contributions to regional stability and economic growth, aligning with its own objectives of international cooperation and development assistance. This partnership underscores the EU's commitment to engaging with extra-European organisations to address global challenges and promote economic resilience.
